verifyUserIsRedirectedToForgotPasswordPa.description: Test Case 84415: R360 BO - Verify user can be redirected to "Enter your Email address " window when click "Forgot Password?"

verifyUserIsReturnedToLoginPage.description: Test Case 84416: R360 BO - Verify user can return to "Login" window after "Login" link clicking

verifyErrorWithEmptyEmailField.description: Test Case 84431: R360 BO - Verify user sees error message when "Email" field is empty

verifyEmailIsNotSentToNotRegisteredUser.description: Test Case 84421: R360 BO - Verify email is not send to not registered user

verifyUserCanResetPassword.description: Test Case 84417: R360BO - Verify user can change password using link from the email (positive case)

verifyUserCantResetPasswordAfterLogin.description: Test Case 84419: R360BO - Verify user can't change password using link from the email after logged in

verifyUserReceivePasswordResetLinkToDiff.description: Test Case 84432: R360 BO - Verify user can receive "Reset Password" letter if "Email" starts with blank
Test Case 84433: R360 BO - Verify user can receive "Reset Password" letter if "Email" ends with blank
Test Case 84435: R360 BO - Verify user can receive "Reset Password" letter when "Email" consists high and low char register
